isis.stitle: TSI 92-12-06 - Release 1992 Service Turbocharger Application Guide For All DT/DTA360 and 466 Engines

subjectgroup.subject: Release 1992 Service Turbocharger Application Guide For All DT/DTA360 and 466 Engines

geninfo.para: The 1992 Navistar Service Turbocharger Application Guide ( Figure 1, Figure 2, and Figure 3) is being released to service. It lists turbocharger applications for model years 1976 to 1992.
PROCEDURE: File the 1992 Service Turbocharger Application Guide with your bulletin file and discard the 1991 Service Turbocharger Application Guide.

figure.caption: Figure 1. 1992 Service Turbocharger Application Guide For All DT/DTA 360 and 466 Engines
Figure 2. 1992 Service Turbocharger Application Guide For All DT/DTA 360 and 466 Engines (Cont.)
Figure 3. 1992 Service Turbocharger Application Guide For All DT/DTA 360 and 466 Engines (Cont.)
